bibl.title: Scarabs, Scaraboids, Seals, and Seal Impressions from Medinet Habu, with Post-pharaonic Stamp Seals and Seal Impressions by T.G. WILFONG. Based on the Field Notes of Uvo HÖLSCHER and Rudolf ANTHES. (The University of Chicago Oriental Institute Publications. 118.)
bibl.publisher: The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago
bibl.note: See pp. 188-218: Post-pharaonic period (Nos. 307-349) [Nos 311-315: Rhodian amphora handles with Greek inscriptions].

TEETER Emily, Scarabs, Scaraboids, Seals, and Seal Impressions from Medinet Habu, with Post-pharaonic Stamp Seals and Seal Impressions by T.G. WILFONG. Based on the Field Notes of Uvo HÖLSCHER and Rudolf ANTHES. (The University of Chicago Oriental Institute Publications. 118.)
Chicago, The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago, 2003, 4°, xxiv-247 pp., figg. et 110 pll. ISBN 1-885923-22-8. $95.
